propertiesClass.name: _themeMap
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
{
    primary: 'btn-primary',
    secondary: 'btn-secondary',
    accent: 'btn-accent',
    neutral: 'btn-neutral',
    ghost: 'btn-ghost',
    link: 'btn-link'
  }

components.name: SelectDropdownComponent

inputsClass.name: items
inputsClass.rawdescription: What options should the dropdown consist of?
inputsClass.description: What options should the dropdown consist of?

inputsClass.name: optionLabel
inputsClass.rawdescription: If items are not primitive types, how should we display the labels?
inputsClass.description: If items are not primitive types, how should we display the labels?

inputsClass.rawdescription: If items are not primitive types, how should we save the values?
inputsClass.description: If items are not primitive types, how should we save the values?

inputsClass.name: size
inputsClass.rawdescription: How large should the dropdown be?

inputsClass.name: state
inputsClass.rawdescription: What is the state of the dropdown? The state overrides the base theme.
inputsClass.description: What is the state of the dropdown? The state overrides the base theme.

inputsClass.name: theme
inputsClass.rawdescription: What is the importance or purpose of this call to action?
inputsClass.description: What is the importance or purpose of this call to action?

components.templateData:
<select [ngClass]="classes">
    <option disabled
            selected>
        {{label}}
    </option>

    @for (item of items; let index = $index; track index) {
        <option>{{item}}</option>
    }
</select>
